thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.ca
thread.title: Elaine

author: Elaine
title: Elaine
text:
We dont often shop online because we prefer to see a product in person so we took a chance and couldnt have been happier with OptimalPrint for various reasons, as follows:
1) timely and quick receipt of the product
2) the quality of the pictures, gloss and stock is fantastic
3) easy to use website and customization
4) happy to support a reliable, Canadian product
Weve already recommended them to others within a couple of weeks from when we received it!
